Author: GitHub
Description:
Did you know the GitHub Universe 2025 conference badge is a mini computer running Python? In this quick tutorial, we show you how to "hack" it by putting it into disc mode, connecting via VS Code, and adding your own GitHub handle. Follow along and personalize your badge in minutes!

#GitHubUniverse #GitHubUniverse2025 #GitHub

Title: How to hack your GitHub Universe 2025 badge
